description: Numerators of Taylor series for tan(x + Pi/4).
references: G. W. Caunt, Infinitesimal Calculus, Oxford Univ. Press, 1914, p. 477.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
mathematica: nmax = 23; t[0, 1] = 1; t[0, _] = 0; t[n_, k_] := t[n, k] = (k-1)*t[n-1, k-1] + (k+1)*t[n-1, k+1]; Numerator[ Table[ Sum[ t[n, k]/n!, {k, 0, n+1}], {n, 0, nmax} ]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Nov 09 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
